JUDGES: Javier Borrego Borrego;Karel Jungwiert;Margarita Tsatsa-Nikolovska;Mark Villiger;Peer Lorenzen;Renate Jaeger;Volodymyr Butkevych
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE . He died on DATE . In a letter of CARDINAL DATE the applicant 's son , PERSON , informed the Court that he wished to pursue the application .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant brought proceedings against the Moskovska State Mine ( DATE “ Шахта GPE ” , hereafter “ the Mine ” ) seeking recovery of occupational disability allowance arrears .

CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG ( PERSON міський суд , hereafter “ the ORG ” ) found in part for the applicant and awarded him CARDINAL GPE PERSON ( ORG ) in compensation for allowance arrears . Considering this sum insufficient , the applicant appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( Донецький обласний суд ) partially quashed this judgment and remitted the case for a fresh consideration .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG allowed the applicant 's claim in part and awarded him ORG in compensation for allowance arrears . The applicant again appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG quashed the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and remitted the case for a fresh consideration .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG raised the applicant 's award up to UAH CARDINAL . This judgment was not appealed against .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant lodged with ORG ( ORG ) a request for leave to appeal against the judgment of CARDINAL DATE under the new cassation procedure . On DATE the panel of CARDINAL judges of ORG rejected his request .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP ORG ( ORG держаної виконавчої служби LOC міського управління юстиції , hereafter “ ORG ” ) instituted enforcement proceedings in respect of ORG judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON палива і енергетики ) decided to wind up the Mine .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG remitted the applicant 's writ of execution and enforcement case - file to the Mine 's liquidation commission .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was paid the court award in full . On the same date the enforcement proceedings were terminated .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
